what_it_looks_like.en:
You're in a dimly lit corridor, gray walls, silent wooden floor.

The target ahead: a small red point at the path's end - you need to touch it without being detected.

You hear your footsteps... every move calculated... you walk slowly, hide behind cover, wait for the right moment.

The silence is heavy, adrenaline low but present - not fear, but sharp focus.

You watch shadows... calculate angles... breathe deeply and quietly.

You move! Smooth motion, two quick steps, touch the target, vanish behind next cover.

The thrill here isn't speed - it's complete control, smooth movement, feeling like a smart ghost.

why_you.en:
- You hate chaos and noise - you love silent mastery and calculated movement
- You enjoy complete body control - every motion conscious, every step intentional
- Your challenge isn't strength but precision - being invisible, moving soundlessly
- You love the feeling of smart control - not through power, but understanding and timing

first_week.en:
**First Week - Getting to Know Silence:**

â€¢ Day 1-2: Silent walking - learn to walk soundlessly, every step conscious, every foot movement calculated

â€¢ Day 3-4: Quick cover reading - enter the path, see obstacles, identify hiding spots in seconds

â€¢ Day 5-7: First slow mission - try to touch target undetected, time doesn't matter, precision and silence do

Goal: Build confidence in your silent movement and quick space-reading ability

progress_markers.en:
**How You Know You're Progressing:**

âœ“ Your steps become quieter and smoother - body moves with natural flow

âœ“ You read paths faster - know where to hide before entering

âœ“ Tension disappears - feel calm even when close to detection

âœ“ You start feeling the "rhythm" - when to move and stop without conscious thought

win_condition.en:
True victory:

â€¢ Complete mission without any detection (ghost mode)
â€¢ Or using minimum possible movements (efficiency master)
â€¢ Or fastest time while maintaining silence (speed stealth)

Each style has its thrill - choose your way or mix them

en: Quick reading of cover and angles

**VR Version:**

Games like:
â€¢ Espire 1: VR Operative - realistic stealth with free movement
â€¢ Phantom: Covert Ops - silent missions in kayak
â€¢ Sneak & Stealth VR - varied stealth challenges

Advantage: Full immersion - you truly feel inside the mission, calculating every move

variant_no_vr.en:
**Non-VR Version:**

â€¢ Corridors with light obstacles and shadow tape
â€¢ Silent "Capture the Flag" game
â€¢ Slow, calculated Ninja Warrior drills

You need:
â€¢ Quiet space with dim lighting
â€¢ Foam or wooden obstacles for hiding
â€¢ Target markers (LED lights or stickers)

Advantage: Real physical training, building balance and control muscles

psychological_hook.en:
**Why You'll Get Hooked:**

This is the sport of quiet intellectuals - who love complete control without noise.

Every mission tests your patience, intelligence, ability to read space quickly.

Adrenaline here is different - not screaming chaos, but sharp focus and deep calm.

After first session, you'll understand why players say:
"Silence is stronger than sound, hidden movement smarter than showing up"
